overview:
Takenori Sato is the Co-Founder and CTO of Musavy, which he started with Co-Founders, Masaaki Nakatsu and Yusuke Ito, in March 2011.

He leads all technology fields in Musavy, particularly specialized in DB, Algorithm, OS, and Infrastructure.

He graduated from Civil Aviation College in Japan, can fly jet aircrafts. Also, he created the prototype of the future car navigation system with TOYOTA.

Previously, he was a leading software engineer and Japan representative of db4Objects ( acquired by Versant Corp in 2008) , and joined as a consultant for Versant Corp until 2010.
